summary: A neuron-transfer scientist experiments with the thoughts of a comatose young woman.
cast: Marius Jampolskis|Jurga Jutaite|Rudolfas Jansonas|Vytautas Kaniusonis|Martina Jablonskyte|Darius Meskauskas|Sharunas Bartas|Brice Fournier|Philip Lenkowsky|Frédéric Andrau|Maciej Marczewski|Nicolas Simon|Arnoldas Eisimantas|Gabija Jaraminaite|Rasmante Burzaite
title: Aurora
